{
  "destination": "Delhi., India",
  "budget": 30000,
  "currency": "INR",
  "totalEstimatedCost": null,
  "weatherAdvisory": null,
  "costBreakdown": [],
  "days": [
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 1",
      "date": "2025-11-02",
      "summary": "Explore Old Delhi's vibrant streets, historical landmarks, and diverse culinary scene. Immerse in rich heritage, taste local delicacies, and experience bustling markets. A perfect introduction to Delhi's soul.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "09:00",
          "title": "Red Fort Visit",
          "description": "Discover the iconic Mughal fortress, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Explore its majestic architecture, museums, and historical significance. A symbol of India's rich past.",
          "location": "Red Fort, Chandni Chowk",
          "cost": 1500,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "13:00",
          "title": "Chandni Chowk Food Walk",
          "description": "Savor authentic street food in Old Delhi's famous market. Try parathas, jalebis, chaat, and more. A culinary adventure through narrow lanes.",
          "location": "Chandni Chowk",
          "cost": 1000,
          "source": "ai"
        },
        {
          "time": "16:00",
          "title": "Jama Masjid Exploration",
          "description": "Visit India's largest mosque, a magnificent example of Mughal architecture. Climb the minaret for panoramic views of Old Delhi. Experience its serene grandeur.",
          "location": "Jama Masjid",
          "cost": 300,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "19:00",
          "title": "Spice Market Experience",
          "description": "Wander through Khari Baoli, Asia's largest spice market. Witness the vibrant colors and aromas of various spices, nuts, and herbs. A sensory delight.",
          "location": "Khari Baoli",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 2",
      "date": "2025-11-03",
      "summary": "Delve into Delhi's glorious Mughal past, visiting iconic tombs and minarets. Witness architectural marvels and serene gardens, reflecting a rich historical legacy. A journey through imperial history.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "09:30",
          "title": "Humayun's Tomb",
          "description": "Explore the stunning precursor to the Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Admire its Persian-inspired architecture and tranquil gardens. A peaceful historical retreat.",
          "location": "Humayun's Tomb",
          "cost": 1500,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "14:00",
          "title": "Qutub Minar Complex",
          "description": "Visit the towering minaret and surrounding historical monuments, a UNESCO site. Discover ancient ruins, intricate carvings, and the Iron Pillar. A testament to early Islamic architecture.",
          "location": "Qutub Minar",
          "cost": 1500,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "17:00",
          "title": "Mehrauli Archaeological Park",
          "description": "Stroll through this sprawling park, home to centuries of ruins and tombs. Discover hidden gems, ancient structures, and lush greenery. A serene walk through history.",
          "location": "Mehrauli Archaeological Park",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 3",
      "date": "2025-11-04",
      "summary": "Experience Delhi's spiritual side with visits to modern architectural wonders and tranquil gardens. Find peace and admire intricate craftsmanship, blending devotion with beauty. A day of calm and reflection.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "10:00",
          "title": "Lotus Temple Visit",
          "description": "Marvel at the unique lotus-shaped Baháʼí House of Worship. Enjoy its serene ambiance and distinctive modern architecture. A symbol of peace and unity.",
          "location": "Lotus Temple",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "14:00",
          "title": "Akshardham Temple",
          "description": "Explore the grand Swaminarayan Akshardham complex. Admire its intricate carvings, exhibitions, and boat ride depicting Indian history. A cultural and spiritual marvel.",
          "location": "Akshardham Temple",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "18:00",
          "title": "Garden of Five Senses",
          "description": "Relax in this unique garden designed to awaken the five senses. Enjoy diverse landscapes, sculptures, and fragrant plants. A refreshing escape from city life.",
          "location": "Garden of Five Senses",
          "cost": 100,
          "source": "places-api"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 4",
      "date": "2025-11-05",
      "summary": "Discover the grandeur of colonial-era architecture and explore India's rich artistic heritage. Witness iconic landmarks and vibrant cultural expressions, blending history with contemporary life.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "09:30",
          "title": "India Gate & Rashtrapati Bhavan",
          "description": "See the iconic war memorial and the President's official residence. Admire the impressive Lutyens' Delhi architecture and historical significance. A patriotic landmark.",
          "location": "India Gate",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "11:30",
          "title": "National Museum",
          "description": "Explore India's largest museum, housing vast collections of art, artifacts, and archaeological finds. Journey through millennia of Indian history and culture.",
          "location": "National Museum",
          "cost": 1950,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "16:00",
          "title": "Dilli Haat",
          "description": "Experience a vibrant open-air market showcasing crafts, food, and cultural performances from various Indian states. Enjoy diverse regional cuisines and unique handicrafts.",
          "location": "Dilli Haat",
          "cost": 300,
          "source": "places-api"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 5",
      "date": "2025-11-06",
      "summary": "Immerse yourself in Delhi's diverse food scene, from hands-on cooking experiences to exploring trendy markets. Savor local flavors and enjoy the city's vibrant culinary pulse. A delicious day out.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "10:00",
          "title": "Indian Cooking Class",
          "description": "Learn to prepare traditional Indian dishes from scratch with a local chef. Discover spices, techniques, and regional recipes. Enjoy your self-cooked meal.",
          "location": "South Delhi",
          "cost": 9000,
          "source": "ai"
        },
        {
          "time": "15:00",
          "title": "Khan Market Exploration",
          "description": "Browse through one of Delhi's most upscale markets. Discover boutiques, bookstores, and cafes. Enjoy a coffee or snack in a chic setting.",
          "location": "Khan Market",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "19:00",
          "title": "Hauz Khas Village Evening",
          "description": "Explore the historic ruins, trendy cafes, and boutiques of Hauz Khas Village. Enjoy dinner with a view of the lake and monuments. A blend of history and modernity.",
          "location": "Hauz Khas Village",
          "cost": 500,
          "source": "places-api"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 6",
      "date": "2025-11-07",
      "summary": "Discover traditional Indian crafts, ancient stepwells, and the vibrant street food culture. Engage with local artistry and taste authentic flavors, connecting with Delhi's creative spirit.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "10:00",
          "title": "National Crafts Museum",
          "description": "Explore India's rich tradition of handicrafts and textiles. Witness live demonstrations by artisans and admire exquisite folk art. A celebration of Indian craftsmanship.",
          "location": "National Crafts Museum",
          "cost": 300,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "14:00",
          "title": "Agrasen ki Baoli",
          "description": "Visit this ancient stepwell, a unique architectural marvel. Descend its many steps and appreciate the historical engineering and serene atmosphere. A hidden urban gem.",
          "location": "Agrasen ki Baoli",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "18:00",
          "title": "Old Delhi Street Food Tour",
          "description": "Embark on another culinary adventure, focusing on different street food specialties. Discover new flavors and hidden food stalls. A delicious evening experience.",
          "location": "Old Delhi",
          "cost": 1500,
          "source": "ai"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 7",
      "date": "2025-11-08",
      "summary": "Find tranquility amidst Delhi's bustling urban landscape by exploring historic gardens and engaging in wellness practices. Rejuvenate your mind and body in serene natural settings.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "09:30",
          "title": "Lodhi Garden Stroll",
          "description": "Enjoy a peaceful morning walk in Lodhi Garden, home to medieval tombs and lush greenery. A perfect spot for relaxation and history appreciation.",
          "location": "Lodhi Garden",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "12:00",
          "title": "Sunder Nursery Visit",
          "description": "Explore this beautifully restored heritage park, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Admire its stunning gardens, water features, and historical monuments. A green oasis.",
          "location": "Sunder Nursery",
          "cost": 300,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "16:00",
          "title": "Yoga/Meditation Session",
          "description": "Participate in a calming yoga or meditation session. Rejuvenate your mind and body, finding inner peace amidst the city's energy. A wellness retreat.",
          "location": "South Delhi",
          "cost": 1500,
          "source": "ai"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 8",
      "date": "2025-11-09",
      "summary": "Experience the spiritual devotion of a Sikh temple, explore a bustling commercial hub, and indulge in a traditional Indian dinner. A day blending cultural immersion with urban exploration.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "10:00",
          "title": "Gurudwara Bangla Sahib",
          "description": "Visit this prominent Sikh house of worship. Witness the community kitchen (langar) and experience the spiritual serenity. A place of peace and selfless service.",
          "location": "Gurudwara Bangla Sahib",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "14:00",
          "title": "Connaught Place Exploration",
          "description": "Discover Connaught Place, a major commercial and financial hub. Shop, dine, and soak in the colonial-era architecture. A vibrant city center.",
          "location": "Connaught Place",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "places-api"
        },
        {
          "time": "19:30",
          "title": "Traditional Indian Dinner",
          "description": "Enjoy a farewell dinner at a renowned restaurant, savoring exquisite Indian cuisine. Experience fine dining and diverse regional flavors. A memorable culinary end.",
          "location": "Central Delhi",
          "cost": 4500,
          "source": "ai"
        }
      ],
      "accommodation": null
    },
    {
      "dateLabel": "Day 9",
      "date": "2025-11-10",
      "summary": "Enjoy a final glimpse of Delhi's unique markets or revisit a favorite spot. Engage in last-minute souvenir shopping before heading to the airport. A relaxed departure day.",
      "activities": [
        {
          "time": "10:00",
          "title": "Daryaganj Book Market (Sunday)",
          "description": "Browse through the famous Sunday book market for unique finds. (If not Sunday, explore another market or revisit a favorite spot). A treasure hunt for book lovers.",
          "location": "Daryaganj",
          "cost": 0,
          "source": "ai"
        },
        {
          "time": "13:00",
          "title": "Last-Minute Souvenir Shopping",
          "description": "Pick up final souvenirs or gifts from a local market. Find handicrafts, textiles, or spices to remember your trip. A final shopping spree.",
